page.title: 06ORTHOPAEDIC HOSPITAL
page.content: Relatives and friends can visit any time of the day, and they can stayfor as long as they want. The patient can have an afternoon off if they wish. The school isn't separated from the hospital. They have two teachers who are both women. They teach for some{20 patients. The lights go out at{10 pm.} One child had had one of his legs made longer during an operation performed by the local orthopaedic surgeon.The leg had been stretched.Then the physiotherapist came each day to give him special exercises to strenghten and mobolise the limb. A girl of 10 had a disease which stopped her from growing. She looked like a 3 year old,so the surgeons were giving her skull and brain special treatment.
